response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its worth to you stands at $1,000,000, and based on this assessment, we propose a fair transaction price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and benefit. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a successful transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
